infos.value: Allow me to tell you about Transcendence, a method of enhancement that can be performed only by those trained to their very limits.
Transcendence may only provide seemingly slight amounts of power with each enhancement...
But once you have performed repeat Reincarnations, the culmination of the power gained will surely be a decisive factor that contributes to your victories in difficult times to come.
◆Transcendence◆

◆Transcendence◆
By unlocking Transcendence, you will be able to gain various bestowed effects and improve each of your base stats by performing enhancements to raise a unit's EX level.
◆Unlock Condition 1◆

◆Unlock Condition◆
In order to unlock Transcendence, a unit capable of Transcendence must have reached Lv. 120.
◆Unlock Condition 2◆
By unlocking Transcendence, <color=#00ffff>the Enhance button will change to a Transcendence button</color> with which you can enhance EX levels and perform Reincarnations.
◆Transcendence: Enhancement 1◆

◆Transcendence: Enhancement◆
Materials and JP can be consumed to raise EX levels, which will enhance bestowed effects and provide randomized status increases.
◆Transcendence: Enhancement 2◆
Furthermore, when performing enhancements, you can also acquire <color=#00ffff>special stars</color> that will be converted into a bonus to a unit's base stats.
◆Transcendence: Reincarnation 1◆

◆Transcendence: Reincarnation◆
By consuming materials to perform Reincarnation, all bonus statuses and EX levels gained will be reset,
◆Transcendence: Reincarnation 2◆
but if you have attained stars via enhancement, these will <color=#00ffff>be converted into bonuses to your unit's base stats</color>.
◆Transcendence◆
Would you like to hear the explanation for Transcendence?
Yes
No
